name: NCDHCFHIRR4ImplementationGuide
title: NCDHC FHIR R4 Implementation Guide
description: NCDHC Implementation guide using FHIR R4

resource.name: NCDHC FHIR Document Base
resource.description: NCDHC FHIR document profile using Bundle resource

resource.name: NCDHC Composition Newborn Bloodspot Screen
resource.description: This profile is being used to define the structure and narrative content necessary for Newborn Bloodspot Screen FHIR document

resource.name: NCDHC Encounter CDHR
resource.description: This is the base NCDHC Encounter profile for CDHR Health Interactions.

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Base
resource.description: This is the base profile for NCDHC Obsrevation. All NCDHC Observation profiles SHALL extend this profile (vital-sgins profiles are excluded)

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Head & Fontanelles Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the check performed around the anatomical feature of the infant skull

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Newborn Bloodspot Screen
resource.description: Observation profile to record completion status and any associated details of the test used to detect certain rare genetic conditions and disorders of the metabolism of the newborn in context.

resource.name: NCDHC Child Patient
resource.description: Profile to represent a Child Patient in NCDHC Context

resource.name: NCDHC Composition Clinical Document Base
resource.description: This profile is used to represent the Compsition associated with a FHIR Clinical Document

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Completion Status
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Values to represent what type of Observation Completion Status are applicable to each completed check/observation.

resource.name: NCDHC Observation DataAbsentReason ValueSet
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Values to represent what type of Observation Data Absent Reasons are applicable when the Observation instance doesn't contain any value

resource.name: NCDHC Observation interpretation
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Codes to determine what type of Observation Interpretation are applicable to each completed check/observation.

resource.name: au-organization-responsibleorg-example
resource.description: Example of AUBaseOrganisation to represent as clinically responsible organisation

resource.name: au-practitioner-examiner-example
resource.description: Example of AUBasePractitioner  to represent as clinically responsible person

resource.name: au-practitionerrole-examiner-example
resource.description: Example of AUBasePractitionerRole  to represent as clinically responsible person

resource.name: ncdhc-composition-nb-bloodspot-screen-example
resource.description: Newborn Delivery Composition Example

resource.name: ncdhc-document-nb-bloodspot-screen-example
resource.description: Newborn Bloodspot Screen FHIR Document Example

resource.name: ncdhc-encounter-cdhr-nb-bloodspot-screen-example
resource.description: Newborn blood spot screening Encounter detils

resource.name: ncdhc-location-cdhr-nb-bloodspot-screen-example
resource.description: Newborn blood spot screening Encounter Location

resource.name: ncdhc-observation-head-fontanelles-exam-example-1
resource.description: Head & Fontanelles Examination example with interpretation only

resource.name: ncdhc-observation-nb-bloodspot-screen-example-2
resource.description: Newborn Bloodspot Screen example with completion status but without effectiveDateTime

resource.name: ncdhc-observation-head-fontanelles-exam-example-2
resource.description: Head & Fontanelles Examination example with interpretation and comment

resource.name: ncdhc-observation-head-fontanelles-exam-example-3
resource.description: Head & Fontanelles Examination example with absent reason

resource.name: ncdhc-observation-nb-bloodspot-screen-example-1
resource.description: Newborn Bloodspot Screen example with completion status and effectiveDateTime

resource.name: ncdhc-patient-child-example-1
resource.description: Example of Child Patient profile to represent new born baby or a living child. This example contains IHI and MRN of the Child

resource.name: ncdhc-patient-child-example-2
resource.description: Example of Child Patient profile to represent new born baby or a living child. This example contains only IHI as the identifier with record status
